summary: App/site updates: remove decorative background from front page; replace existing image in 'About Our Practice' section with an uploaded photo.

existing_features.title: Remove all decorative background styling from the front page (Hero section) so it displays on a plain background with no pattern, no decorative overlays, and no background image; keep the existing hero text, buttons, and scroll-to-section behavior unchanged.
Replace the existing image in the “About Our Practice” section with the uploaded photo, and ensure the image renders correctly in the existing square frame without breaking layout.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove front page background designs/pattern and use no decorative background.
Replace the existing image in the 'About Our Practice' section with the uploaded photo.

projectName: Remove front-page hero background designs and replace About profile image with uploaded photo
